mapper.select: SELECT ibh.*, fo.org_name as `inv_org_name`, mv.vendor_name, fu.USER_NAME as `operator_name` FROM so_headers ibh LEFT JOIN fnd_org fo on ibh.inv_org_id = fo.org_id LEFT JOIN mdm_vendors mv on ibh.customer_id = mv.vendor_id LEFT JOIN fnd_user fu on ibh.sales_id = fu._id where 1=1 and so_type=#{so_type} and (sales_id=#{sales_id} or create_by =#{create_by}) ORDER BY create_date desc
